page.title: 06TRANSPORT
page.content: Chillcotts taxi sevice has been going for seventy years. They have four regular customers in our area & some occasioal customers. In bad weather mostly old people use the taxis & young people use them at night. A journey from Moulton to Newmarket costs two pounds thirty. Children from the area, are transported,by bus to schools in Newmarket. The Eastern Counties buses operate once a day in Moulton and Kentford but 5 times a day in Gazeley. Millers Coaches of Kentford have been in business for 18 months and run 8 Coaches altogether. The cost of a new coach to buy is 30000 to 150000 pounds.They have 6 full time employees, some part time drivers and carry about 700 passengers every day. They do work for the British and american air forces, local schools,
